Title: Bokura no: Tsuisou
Description: ['A Bokurano recap episode of first 15 episodes. Aired on the 24 July 2007 on channel tvk instead of episode 16, while other stations cancelled the broadcast altogether for the same week. ']
Related: ['Adaptation: Tsuujou Kougeki ga Zentai Kougeki de 2-kai Kougeki no Okaasan wa Suki desu ka?', 'Other: Tsuujou Kougeki ga Zentai Kougeki de Ni-kai Kougeki no Okaasan wa Suki Desu ka?']
Characters: ['Ushiro, Jun', 'Koemushi', 'Yamura, Daiichi', 'Moji, Kunihiko', 'Honda, Chizuru', 'Machi, Yoko', 'Nakarai, Mako', 'Kirie, Yousuke', 'Ano, Maki', 'Yoshikawa, Kanji']
